name: Mistical Magic
description:
Ayyy Gamejam entry for GMTK's 2020 Jam

It's a game about losing control.

This was attempted by losing the ability to jump and shoot when you get hit, also by using those as ammo.

The 2 orbs flying around the player represent these 2 resources. When one is expended, it'll dim for a bit. When it's back on, it'll go back to normal

Many thanks to:
https://twitter.com/Tatane_bun for basically making the BGM
https://www.fontspace.com/codeman38 for the font
